channel.title: TOM YUE Hugo Site

item.title: My First Post -- Build your own website using Hugo
item.description: Introduction This is bold text, and this is emphasized text. Visit the Hugo website! All the website is implemented using Hugo, which is a better tool for fast deploying website. Implementation detail Prerequisites Before you begin this tutorial you must: Install Hugo (the extended edition) Install Git You must also be comfortable working from the command line. Create website directory hugo new site quickstart cd quickstart git init git submodule add https://github.
